about_the_game:
Eldoria: Crystals Of Hope




Immerse yourself in an epic adventure with Eldoria: Crystals of Hope, a jRPG that blends tradition and innovation in a post-cataclysmic world.

Story


After a global cataclysm reshaped the Earth's geography, new continents emerged from the oceans, creating a new world to explore. Amidst this new era, meet Elena, a 17-year-old girl about to graduate from the Lumen Elemental School as a Light Elemental.

Elena's peaceful life is upended when her father, a renowned archaeologist, discovers one of the legendary Crystals of Hope in the mines of Lumen. Upon touching the crystal, Elena experiences vivid flashbacks of past lives she never knew existed. As she sets out to understand these visions, she learns that a planet is on a collision course with Earth. The key to preventing this disaster lies in uncovering the mysteries of her past and the true power of the Crystals of Hope.

Join Elena on her journey to uncover hidden truths, gather allies, and face epic challenges to ensure humanity's survival.

Gameplay


Fascinating Exploration: Discover a vibrant world in pixel art, filled with secrets, breathtaking landscapes, and memorable characters.
Turn-Based Battles: Engage in strategic and dynamic combat with a diverse cast of 15 playable characters.
Deep Narrative: Experience a rich and engaging story with fully voiced dialogues and an exciting anime-style introduction.
Classic jRPG Elements: Enjoy classic gameplay with a modern twist, including quests, puzzles, and character development.

Key Features


Captivating Pixel Art: Stunning visuals that combine nostalgia with innovation.
Voiced Dialogues: Full immersion with voices that bring characters and their stories to life.
Anime Introduction: A cinematic anime opening that sets the epic tone of the adventure.
Memorable Characters: Meet and recruit a diverse cast of allies, each with their own abilities and stories.
Prepare for the Journey

Eldoria: Crystals of Hope offers an unforgettable experience for jRPG fans. With an exciting story, captivating graphics, and engaging gameplay, this is a game that must be in your collection.

Get Eldoria: Crystals of Hope on Steam and embark on this epic journey to save Earth!
